channel.title: Anyone used Getapp.com
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I'm looking for ways to a) generate traffic to my recently launched SAAS, http://www.pageproofer.com and b) get some marketing content (i.e. paid reviews) out there on the internet to help drive traffic. I came across Getapp.com which looks like a decent (yet pricey) option. Has anyone used their service? Good/bad/other?

item.title: Anyone used Getapp.com
item.dc:creator: ttWalnut
item.description:
I haven’t used it, but I know they are willing to work with you on the price. I signed up but didn’t complete an order and a couple of days later I received an email from a sales person who offered to reduce the fee by $99 after I expressed concern about the price. I’m can send you the sales rep’s email if you’d like.

Read full topic
